articles.title: Wall Street Ends Week on a High Note - July 25, 2025
articles.description: The S&P 500 and Nasdaq Composite reached record highs, driven by strong corporate earnings and optimism over potential trade agreements with the European Union and Asia-Pacific partners.

articles.title: The 7 things you need to know for Friday, July 25
articles.description: Key news highlights include the U.S. and Israel withdrawing from Gaza ceasefire talks, the IRS considering eliminating non-English language tax services, and the FCC approving the $8 billion Paramount-Skydance merger.

articles.description: Coverage includes President Trump's executive order on homelessness, the politics behind the Paramount-Skydance merger, and potential financial gains for private companies from mass deportations.
